GamePlay
Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
  GamePlay.ScoreManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ScoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

System used to calculate the scores obtained from killing enemies based on the specifications requested by the client.

See Also:

Method Detail

determineScoreFromKills

public int determineScoreFromKills(java.util.ArrayList<KillSet> enemiesKilled)
Main method of the class in charge of deciding the logic that will be used to calculate the score from the kills.

Parameters:
enemiesKilled - An ArrayList of KillSet objects specifying the type of enemy that was killed, where it died, and where the bomb that killed it was located.
Returns:
An integer representing the score obtained from the enemies killed by the player.

calculateScore

public int calculateScore(java.util.ArrayList<KillSet> kills)
Based on the number of killed enemies, calls a specific function to determine the score from the group of enemies killed.

Parameters:
kills - An ArrayList specifying the enemies killed by a specific bomb.
Returns:
An integer representing the score obtained from the enemies killed by the player.

determineScoreForManyKills

public int determineScoreForManyKills(java.util.ArrayList<KillSet> kills)
Determines the score obtained when a single bomb kills more than 2 enemies. It first sorts the kills based on distance to the location of the bomb that killed them. And then it doubles the double for each successive kill.

Parameters:
kills - An ArrayList specifying the enemies killed by a specific bomb.
Returns:
An integer specifying the score obtained from killing more than two enemies with a single bomb blast.

determineScoreForTwoKills

public int determineScoreForTwoKills(KillSet killedEnemyA,
                                     KillSet killedEnemyB)
Determines the score obtained from killing two enemies. In this case, the lowest value kill gets doubled. Order of the enemies passed does not matter.

Parameters:
killedEnemyA - Enemy instance killed by the bomb blast.
killedEnemyB - Enemy instance killed by the bomb blast.
Returns:
An integer speicfying the score obtained from killing two enemies with a single bomb blast.
